Package com.example.checkers

Class Logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.checkers.Logic
  • public class Logic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static helper functions for the Logic implementation in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • isPieceNeeds2BeKing

        public static boolean isPieceNeeds2BeKing​(boolean isBlack,
                                          int x)
        Wrapper function for isBlackNeeds2BeKing and isRedNeeds2BeKing.
        Parameters:
        isBlack - The piece color.
        x - The given x cord.
        Returns:
        true or false according if the piece needs to be king or not.

      • isOnRightEdge

        public static boolean isOnRightEdge​(int y)
        Check if the given y cord is on right edge.
        Parameters:
        y - The given y cord.
        Returns:
        true if the y cord is on the right edge of the board, false otherwise.

      • isOnLeftEdge

        public static boolean isOnLeftEdge​(int y)
        Check if the given y cord is on left edge.
        Parameters:
        y - The given y cord.
        Returns:
        true if the y cord is on the left edge of the board, false otherwise.

      • canRedMoveDown

        public static boolean canRedMoveDown​(int x)
        Check if red has space to move.
        Parameters:
        x - The given x cord.
        Returns:
        true if the x cord is not in the end of the board for red, false otherwise.

      • canBlackMoveUp

        public static boolean canBlackMoveUp​(int x)
        Check if black has space to move.
        Parameters:
        x - The given x cord.
        Returns:
        true if the x cord is not in the end of the board for black, false otherwise.

      • hasSpaceForLeftJump

        public static boolean hasSpaceForLeftJump​(int x,
                                          int y,
                                          boolean isBlack)
        Check if not on edge and has space to jump.
        Parameters:
        x - The given x cord.
        y - The given y cord.
        isBlack - The color of the piece.
        Returns:
        true if piece is not on the edge for left jump, false otherwise.

      • hasSpaceForRightJump

        public static boolean hasSpaceForRightJump​(int x,
                                           int y,
                                           boolean isBlack)
        Check if not on edge and has space to jump.
        Parameters:
        x - The given x cord.
        y - The given y cord.
        isBlack - The color of the piece.
        Returns:
        true if piece is not on the edge for right jump, false otherwise.

      • isTileAvailable

        public static boolean isTileAvailable​(Board board,
                                      int x,
                                      int y)
        Check if the given x and y axis are taken on the board by another piece.
        Parameters:
        board - The Board object that holds the current state of the game.
        x - The given x cord.
        y - The given y cord.
        Returns:
        true if the tile is not taken by another piece in the board, false otherwise.

      • isTileForChecker

        public static boolean isTileForChecker​(int x,
                                       int y)
        Check if the given tile is darkwood colored or not (darkwood colored tile means that a checker can be placed on it).
        Parameters:
        x - the x axis of the tile on the board.
        y - the y axis of the tile on the baord.
        Returns:
        True if a checker can be placed on a given tile (represented by x and y axis), false otherwise.
